panels.title: Request Latency by HTTP Method, Path and Code

targets.expr: sort_desc(sum(increase(cxc_lb_job_count{pod=~"$pod", tenant_name=~"$tenant_name", ccid=~"$ccid", type=~"$type", service="$service"}[$__range])) by (result)) or on() vector(0)

(sum (increase(cxc_lb_job_count{pod=~"$pod", type=~"$type", ccid=~"$ccid", tenant_name=~"$tenant_name", type=~"$type", result="FAIL", service="$service"}[$interval]))  OR on() vector(0))
/
(sum (increase(cxc_lb_job_count{pod=~"$pod", type=~"$type", ccid=~"$ccid", tenant_name=~"$tenant_name", type=~"$type", service="$service"}[$interval]))  OR on() vector(0))

*100

(sum (increase(cxc_lb_job_count{pod=~"$pod", type=~"$type", ccid=~"$ccid", tenant_name=~"$tenant_name", type=~"$type", result="SUCCESS", service="$service"}[$interval]))  OR on() vector(0))
/
(sum (increase(cxc_lb_job_count{pod=~"$pod", type=~"$type", ccid=~"$ccid", tenant_name=~"$tenant_name", type=~"$type", service="$service"}[$interval]))  OR on() vector(0))

*100
sum(cxc_lb_jobs_running_total{pod=~"$pod", tenant_name=~"$tenant_name", ccid=~"$ccid", type=~"$type", service="$service"}) or on() vector(0)

sum(increase(cxc_lb_contacts_imported_total{pod=~"$pod", tenant_name=~"$tenant_name", ccid=~"$ccid", type=~"$type", service="$service"}[$__range])) OR on() vector(0)
+
sum(increase(cxc_lb_rejected_contact_lines_total{pod=~"$pod", tenant_name=~"$tenant_name", ccid=~"$ccid", type=~"$type", service="$service"}[$__range]))  OR on() vector(0)
sum(increase(cxc_lb_contacts_imported_total{pod=~"$pod", ccid=~"$ccid", tenant_name=~"$tenant_name", service="$service"}[$interval])) by (tenant_name,ccid) or on() vector(0)
sum(increase(cxc_lb_rejected_contact_lines_total{pod=~"$pod", ccid=~"$ccid", tenant_name=~"$tenant_name", service="$service"}[$interval])) by (tenant_name,ccid) or on() vector(0)

(sum(increase(cxc_lb_contacts_imported_total{pod=~"$pod", ccid=~"$ccid", tenant_name=~"$tenant_name", service="$service"}[1m])) OR on() vector(0))
+
(sum(increase(cxc_lb_rejected_contact_lines_total{pod=~"$pod", ccid=~"$ccid", tenant_name=~"$tenant_name", service="$service"}[1m])) OR on() vector(0))

panels.title: Current Contacts import speed per minute

targets.expr: sum(increase(cxc_lb_devices_imported_total{pod=~"$pod", tenant_name=~"$tenant_name", ccid=~"$ccid", type=~"$type", service="$service"}[$__range]))  OR on() vector(0)
sum(increase(cxc_lb_devices_imported_total{pod=~"$pod", ccid=~"$ccid", tenant_name=~"$tenant_name", service="$service"}[1m]))  OR on() vector(0)
